languages.text: "Может и будут. А может и помилует их Защитник наш, все ж таки смелые люди были, бранную смерть приняли. Ох, ну и ересь я реку".
"Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."
languages.original_text: "Может и будут. А может и помилует их Защитник наш, все ж таки смелые люди были, бранную смерть приняли. Ох, ну и ересь я реку".

traits.locale_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."
"Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

"Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

languages.text: “或许他们的灵魂会腐烂，又或许神皇会怜悯他们。毕竟，他们都是在战场上牺牲的勇士。呃，我刚刚还真是说了好几句异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

traits.locale_text: “或许他们的灵魂会腐烂，又或许神皇会怜悯他们。毕竟，他们都是在战场上牺牲的勇士。呃，我刚刚还真是说了好几句异端邪说。”

languages.text: 「そうかもしれないが、我らの守護者は彼らに情けをもってくださるかもしれない。戦で死神に出会った勇敢なやつらなんだから。あー、やだやだ、つい異端を口にしてしまったよ」
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

traits.locale_text: 「そうかもしれないが、我らの守護者は彼らに情けをもってくださるかもしれない。戦で死神に出会った勇敢なやつらなんだから。あー、やだやだ、つい異端を口にしてしまったよ」

languages.text: «Tal vez lo hagan. O quizás nuestro protector se apiade de ellos. Después de todo, eran personas valientes que murieron en batalla. Agh, eso que acabo de soltar es una herejía».
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez lo hagan. O quizás nuestro protector se apiade de ellos. Después de todo, eran personas valientes que murieron en batalla. Agh, eso que acabo de soltar es una herejía».

languages.text: "Ja, vielleicht. Oder vielleicht hat unser Beschützer Gnade mit ihnen. Sie waren schließlich mutig und haben ihren Tod in der Schlacht gefunden. Gah, das war ja richtige Ketzerei, was ich da gerade gesagt habe."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, vielleicht. Oder vielleicht hat unser Beschützer Gnade mit ihnen. Sie waren schließlich mutig und haben ihren Tod in der Schlacht gefunden. Gah, das war ja richtige Ketzerei, was ich da gerade gesagt habe."

languages.text: « C'est possible. Ou peut-être que notre bienfaiteur les prendra en pitié. Après tout, ces braves ont trouvé la mort au combat. Argh, je me rends compte que ce que je dis est une véritable hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

traits.locale_text: « C'est possible. Ou peut-être que notre bienfaiteur les prendra en pitié. Après tout, ces braves ont trouvé la mort au combat. Argh, je me rends compte que ce que je dis est une véritable hérésie. »

languages.text: "Belki... Belki de Koruyucumuz merhamet gösterir. Nihayetinde onlar; muharebede can vermiş, cesur insanlardı. Of, ağzımdan çıkana bak. Resmen kâfirlik."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they will. Or maybe our Protector will have mercy upon them. They were, after all, brave people who met their death in battle. Gah, that was some right proper heresy I just uttered."

traits.locale_text: "Belki öyle olur. Veya belki Koruyucu'muz onlara merhamet gösterir. Nihayetinde onlar muharebede can vermiş cesur insanlardı. Ah, ağzımdan çıkan şeyler resmen kâfirlik."
